attributes.action: Ban smoking althougher or reduce tax on tobacco.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for the government to either ban smoking altogther or reduce tax on tobacco.

-

You put taxes up on smoking every 6 months hitting us smokers harder and harder whilst making a nice profit from the process in the name of 'making smokers quit'.

We already pay for the NHS budget in tax!

Why not ban smoking altogether!? That will make me and other smokers stop!!

-

It is hypocritcal of you to be 'anti-smoking' whilst you continue to milk us.

Ban it or stop taxing it.
